Define Documentation

#define APPL_COM_DIRECT_COMMAND   0xF3

Execute an AS3911 direct command.

#define APPL_COM_EMV_ATTRIB   0xE6

EMV TTA L1 ATTRIB button pressed.

#define APPL_COM_EMV_DIGITAL   0xE8

EMV TTA L1 digital test start button pressed.

#define APPL_COM_EMV_INIT   0xEF

EMV mode initialization command.

#define APPL_COM_EMV_POLL   0xE1

EMV TTA L1 poll button prossed.

#define APPL_COM_EMV_PREVALIDATION   0xE7

EMV TTA L1 prevalidation test start button pressed.

#define APPL_COM_EMV_RATS   0xE5

EMV TTA L1 RATS button pressed.

#define APPL_COM_EMV_RESET   0xE2

EMV TTA L1 reset button presed.

#define APPL_COM_EMV_STOP   0xEA

EMV TTA L1 prevalidation or digital test application stop button pressed.

#define APPL_COM_EMV_TOGGLE_CARRIER   0xE0

EMV TTA L1 carrier button pressed.

#define APPL_COM_EMV_WUPA   0xE3

EMV TTA L1 WUPA button pressed.

#define APPL_COM_EMV_WUPB   0xE4

EMV TTA L1 WUPB button pressed.

#define APPL_COM_REG_DUMP   0xF0

Dump register content.

#define APPL_COM_REG_READ   0xF2

Read register.

#define APPL_COM_REG_WRITE   0xF1

Write register.
